Uses of SimpleMessage in bgu.csp.az.api
 

Methods in bgu.csp.az.api with parameters of type SimpleMessage
protected  void Agent.beforeMessageSending(SimpleMessage m)
          override this function in the case you want to make some action every time before sending a message this is a great place to write logs, attach timestamps to the message etc.
 void Hooks.BeforeMessageSentHook.hook(SimpleMessage msg)
           
 void Hooks.BeforeMessageProcessingHook.hook(SimpleMessage msg)
           
 

Uses of SimpleMessage in bgu.csp.az.api.agt
 

Methods in bgu.csp.az.api.agt that return SimpleMessage
protected  SimpleMessage SimpleAgent.beforeMessageProcessing(SimpleMessage msg)
          you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
 

Methods in bgu.csp.az.api.agt with parameters of type SimpleMessage
protected  SimpleMessage SimpleAgent.beforeMessageProcessing(SimpleMessage msg)
          you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
